name: SHUT UP & TAKE MY MONEY
description:
Juego multijugador masivo local (utilizando móviles) sobre #invertir en #startups escuchando el #pitch de los #entrepreneurs.

Massive local multiplayer game of investments.

Hear the entrepreneurs' pitch and invest your money.

Play using your mobile connected to the same net and join at happyfuntimes.net

(Only in spanish, sorry)

Icons for the background stolen from flaticon.com
